rules.no_circular_deps: Section A cannot include Section B if B includes A.
rules.orphan_check: Every file in /snippets must be referenced at least once.
rules.asset_coupling: JS/CSS assets must be loaded strictly within their parent Section/Block (no global pollution).

validation_action.script: Scan all 'render', 'include', 'section' tags and build a Tree. Alert on broken links.
